main event: A disc-shaped object was observed over Big Spring, Texas, lasting approximately 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported as having no tail or exhaust trail., The sighting was recorded under Project Blue Book., It was not illuminated and had no wings., The object's speed was estimated to exceed 500 MPH., The sighting included various evaluations regarding potential balloon activity.
witness description: Pilot who reported a bright red light and unusual object.
